name: Erran Carey @ Rapid7
body:
### About
Hi, I'm Erran Carey:
* @ipwnstuff on GitHub or Twitter.
* Email: erran_carey@rapid7.com

### Work
For the most part I've been developing Chef cookbooks and helping create a better test workflow.

### Help or Contact
Want to recommend an update to some of my code or ask for help using it?
Email me: erran_carey@rapid7.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
